name: Rescue HQ - The Tycoon
detailed_description:
Together with the developer stillalive studios Aerosoft is working on a new project: Rescue HQ - The Tycoon!

In this multifaceted tycoon you stand up for the safety and health of the citizens in your city. The challenge? To organize and manage a station of three emergency departments! As manager of the headquarter it is your job to provide enough personnel and resources at all times so you are able to react to any unforeseen mission in time. At the same time you have to keep an eye on your finances to make sure you have enough funds to further develop you headquarter – a balancing act that can lead to difficult decisions.

Can you keep cool and stay on top of the situation, despite three departments, numerous missions, and scarce resources demanding your attention? Prove your skills, your city counts on you!

short_description: In this multifaceted tycoon you stand up for the safety and health of the citizens in your city. The challenge? To organize and manage a station of three emergency departments!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 7/8/10 (64Bit)
  • Processor: Processor Quad Core CPU with at least 2.6 GHZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Grafikkarte Geforce 760 or similiar
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
